item.title: The pavement is completely blocked by fallen over "Ridgeway" barriers which I think have been left over from previous road closure. Creating hazard for both pedestrians and car drivers., 9th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Albert Place, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Bernardos is reporting water ingress into the shop from the alleyway, 9th December
item.description:

item.title: Lorry stuck on recent council drain works, 9th December
item.description:
Large lorry is stuck on the drainworks that were only finished last week. The ground is completely churned up and the new coping verges damaged. The neighbor in the photos is extremely obstructive and offensive. apparently a towing vehicle needs to be used to assist the lorry which will cause more damage to the green and work carried out by your good selves. We as a community use this green all the time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Glebe Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
